question.title: FXGL getAssetLoader().loadFont() fails to load TTF font from /assets/ui/fonts/ directory
question.body:
I'm trying to load a custom TTF font in an FXGL 21.1 game application, but getAssetLoader().loadFont() consistently fails to find the font file, even though it exists in the correct directory structure.

Here's how my project structure is: screenshot of my project org/structure

I've also referenced the docs/wiki, and FXGL 11, states this is how assets should be organized (which I am following) screenshot of how assets should be organized from FXGL Docs

This is my code

private static final String GAME_FONT = "Astroz Trial.ttf";

@Override
protected void initUI() {
    Text scoreText = getUIFactoryService().newText("", Color.BLACK, 32);
    
    try {
        scoreText.setFont(getAssetLoader().loadFont(GAME_FONT).newFont(32));
    } catch (Exception e) {
        System.out.println("Custom font not found at: " + GAME_FONT + ", using default font");
    }
    
    scoreText.textProperty().bind(getip("score").asString("Score: %d"));
    addUINode(scoreText);

Error output

Custom font not found at: Astroz Trial.ttf, using default font

The FXGL logs show:

WARN  FXGLAssetLoaderServi - Asset "/assets/ui/fonts/Astroz Trial.ttf" was not found!
WARN  FXGLAssetLoaderServi - Failed to load FONT

What I've tried

  1. Verified the file exists at src/main/resources/assets/ui/fonts/Astroz Trial.ttf
  2. Confirmed the file is being packaged (visible in IDE project structure)
  3. Tried renaming the file to remove spaces: AstrozTrial.ttf (same result)
  4. Performed clean build: mvn clean compile
  5. Other assets (textures, sounds, music) load successfully from /assets/textures/ and /assets/sounds/

Environment

  • FXGL: 21.1
  • JavaFX: 21.0.1
  • Java: 25.0.1
  • Build Tool: Maven

Question

What is the correct way to load a custom TTF font in FXGL? Does getAssetLoader().loadFont() expect a different directory structure or file path format than other asset types?

Alternative approaches using JavaFX's Font.loadFont() also fail, and attempting to set the font on FXGL's Text object throws "Text.font : A bound value cannot be set" because the UIFactory already binds the font property.

question_comments.body: Also, can you load the font directly with Font::loadFont?
